# aspectRatio

**Instance Property**

An aspect ratio.

## Declaration

```swift
var aspectRatio: AVCaptureDevice.AspectRatio { get }
```

## Discussion

One of the enumerated aspect ratios  suitable for use with the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] dynamic aspect ratio APIs.

## Inspecting a framing

- **zoomFactor**: A zoom factor.
title: aspectRatio
